title: What are the pros and cons of high self-esteem? - Quora

response.answer_text: To be clear, high self esteem isn't high confidence, isn't egotistical, isn't self centered. Obviously were playing semantics games at this point but it's valuable to recognize that you can be proud of your accomplishments, love and trust yourself, think you're the best thing since sliced bread, or act and choose as if you are all that matters…. And any combination of those. So high self esteem? That's confidence in your self and abilities. Respect for your own being. There are few if any cons. The benefit of respecting yourself unconditionally is paramount to evolving your person. Respect for yourself both removes susceptibility to external insult and pressure, and improves your ability to act honestly and with integrity. If you respect yourself, you honor the most integrated tool you've been given in this life. And when that occurs, the potential for you to make a positive impact on the world and community around you grows. The perceived cons of self esteem are actually elements of egotistical and self centeredness.

High self-esteem: one’s ability to have a clear understanding of one’s strengths and weaknesses. An acceptance of of those strengths and weaknesses and ability to use that knowledge to live a better life. Low self-esteem: A constant and incessant onslaught on oneself, caused by an inability to recognize one’s strengths and weaknesses. A never-ending series of emotional suicides. I’ve been there. Let’s discuss high self esteem: The pros: You will have a clear understanding of what you really want in life.You will know what steps to take when you need to comfort yourselfYou will possess a deeper set of skills and you will likely succeed to the levels you see fit.The cons: You will fall into a trap where you feel like the things you do no longer provide the thrills they used to;You will lose people in your life whom you thought were important;you will have a greater understanding of life and you might not like what you discover.This is a difficult question, because of the difficulty in recognizing the cons of high self-esteem. Hope this answers your question.
